features.additionalInfo: Regardless of your business structure and needs, we have an Asset Finance Solution that will suit you.

features.additionalValue: Get the right deal for you
features.additionalInfo: Whether you're a small business or large corporation, our Australian based Asset Finance Specialists are here to help you get the solution that suits you.

features.additionalValue: We're with you even if things change
features.additionalInfo: We'll try our best to make things easy, and work with you to manage your finance, even if your business circumstances change.
We'll look at your cash flow and business structure to work out a range of finance options for your business
Our pricing is based on how much you're borrowing and what your loan term is.
Be informed and up to date regarding your Asset Finance Agreement. Access to your agreement can be made available to registered CommBiz users.
Once your application is approved, we will process the payment to your supplier within four business hours of signing your contract online.

Get faster approval when upgrading or replacing financed assets if you have 12 months of good repayment history. Our simple Replacement Pathway is available for businesses who are upgrading or replacing business cars or equipment currently under finance. Approvals are conditional and subject to the replacement asset being suitable to the Bank. Acceptable evidence of good payment history is required. The asset being purchased must not be older than the asset being replaced. The finance agreement on the asset being replaced must be repaid and the new repayment must not increase by more than 25 per cent. Additional information may be requested depending on your application details, the asset being financed and individual circumstances.
Borrow from $20,000
Fixed interest rates & repayments
No monthly fees
$0 upfront deposit

features.additionalValue: Repayment options - Customised for your business
features.additionalInfo: We can increase or decrease the repayments to match your seasonal cashflows; speak to us to find out more
When you're structuring your quote, you can:Select how long you want to finance for
When you're structuring your quote, you can:View the total cost over the loan term
When you're structuring your quote, you can:Select which monthly repayments works best for you

features.additionalValue: Repayment options - Customised for your business
features.additionalInfo: Repayment frequency can also be quarterly in advance
Fixed or seasonal payment schedules available, so you can put your business' cash flow first.

Discounted rate for energy efficient cars and equipment. Get finance discounts on a wide range of energy efficient assets, like yellow goods, agri machinery, electric and hybrid vehicles, solar and batteries, and renewable energy projects. A discount can apply for qualifying energy efficient vehicles and equipment and applies to the standard rate you would normally pay for the equipment you wish to finance.
Customise the loan and repayments to your business needs.

features.additionalValue: Rates & Fees - No extra security required
features.additionalInfo: Leaves existing asset equity and other lines of credit for other business purposes

features.additionalValue: Rates & Fees - No extra security required
features.additionalInfo: The financed asset serves as the loan security
Amount depends on the type of agreement you'd like
Can be financed into the agreement, or paid upfront.

features.additionalValue: The choice to own it later
features.additionalInfo: We'll own the car or equipment but you can offer to buy it from us at the end of your lease agreement.
Online agreement to avoid paperwork delays
Fast online quote
Prompt payment once you've signed

features.additionalValue: Stay in control of your costs
features.additionalInfo: We'll look at your anticipated cash flow and give you a range of finance options. Choose to pay monthly or quarterly over two to five years.
You may be able to claim input tax credits for rental and other charges that are subject to GST.

features.additionalValue: Rates & Fees - $0 upfront deposit and no monthly fees
features.additionalInfo: We finance the full price of your financed equipment. No hidden charges or surprises.

eligibility.additionalInfo: Financing equipment that will be used by a business (mostly or entirely for business purposes)
You can apply if your business: Has a current ABN
You can apply if your business: Has been trading for more than 12 months
You can apply if your business: Has a good credit rating
You can apply if your business: Isn't going through the process of bankruptcy
Applications are subject to the Bank's normal credit approval and suitability of the asset.
An individual, sole trader, sole owner of your company or someone authorised to apply for finance and credit for a business

fees.name: Standard Documentation Fee
fees.additionalInfo: (excluding GST) Added to borrowed amount ($0 upfront payment) or can be paid upfront. The document fee is a one-off processing fee. You can pay it upfront or add it to your borrowed amount which will increase your finance amount and how much interest you'll need to pay.

lendingRates.additionalInfo: Rate shown is indicative, current as at the time of publishing and is dependent on but not limited to the term of the finance, amount financed, suitability of the financed asset and credit assessment of the applicant. Fees, charges & Terms and Conditions apply.

lendingRates.additionalValue: Default Rate on any amount due and remaining unpaid. The Default Rate is a rate that is 3% per annum above the Interest Rate we use to calculate the payment under the Contract.

data.name: Finance Lease
data.description: Car and equipment finance. Ready when you are with our simple business car and equipment finance. Get a quote online in less than 60 seconds for new and used assets.
